Articles.Content:
Just uploaded first in the series of missions to Duna, first we send a probe to investigate the planet Duna and its companion Ike.

http://youtu.be/Uf9AL5wwAgU

Description

The Kerbals first steps towards manned (or Kerbaled mission) to Duna, we send a probe for a sneak peak of what Duna has in store for us. From the data collected by the probe we can plan our exploration of Duna, design and build the space craft that we will use to send with our Kerbals to this Mars coloured planet.

But before we get carried away lets concentrate on gathering the data from our probe.

Mods used are:

Kerbal Engineer Redux By...Cybutek

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kerbal-engineer-redux-v0-5/

Fairings By...Alexey Volynskov

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/procedural-fairings/

S.C.A.N. sat (only available as Beta on KSP forum at the moment)

By...Phuzz

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/1103-Using-SCANSat
